comment: Super Spreaders not ashamed of mobilising crowds even when there in no vacancy in hispitals and shamshaan ghats. All of them stand exposed in the Hamam.
amr:
# ::snt Super Spreaders not ashamed of mobilising crowds even when there in no vacancy in hispitals and shamshaan ghats. All of them stand exposed in the Hamam.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shame-02

                  :ARG1 (c / crowd))
            :concession (e / even-when

                              :op2 (g / ghat

      :snt2 (e2 / expose-01

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Hamam"))))
